description.value:
Level 2 Conjuration

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: 60 feet

Components: V, S, M (a ball of wax)

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You create a 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. As a Bonus Action|XPHB, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet, rolling it along the ground. If you move the sphere into a creature's space, that creature makes the save against the sphere, and the sphere stops moving for the turn. When you move the sphere, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried start burning|XPHB if touched by the sphere, and it sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 20 feet.

At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 2d6|2-9|1d6 for each spell slot level above 2.
